title: Dreams
description: The Heart of a Salamander is a series of fantasy romance novels about true love and the mysterious world of elementals. When your fantasies come true, new possibilities and dangers emerge. The heroes of the stories will have to pass incredible tests to find and keep their love in the fantasy world of nymphs, sylphs, pygmies, salamanders, and other spirits.The heroine of the DREAMS - the first story of The Salamander series, Ella finds herself in a world of extraordinary possibilities and incredible dangers. To see her love again, she must overcome many obstacles, discover her previously unknown abilities, and learn to live in this fantasy world.INFO: Elementals are nymphs, sylphs, pygmies and salamanders, and other spirits - according to the ideas of the famous alchemist and a man of the Renaissance, Theophrastus Von Hohenheim called Paracelsus.“You may know me - I am Ella, and I have a salamander’s heart. Or I think so.I love my Graham, my billionaire prince, and my love started as a sweet love story. However, life brings new challenges. I will tell you my story, and you shall do nothing but listen to it.I hope such adventures and strange events will never happen to you, so please sit down, and listen to me.”Says Ella, the heroine of DREAMS.This story is created in a Portal Fantasy form (when a person from the "real" world is being transported to another world, the world of elementals).Let us imagine what awaits Ella and her love there, in a world of fantasy, fairy tales, dark forces, and magic...For fans of A Court of Thorns and Roses, A Court of Silver Flames, A Court of Mist and Fury, A Court of Wings and Ruin by Sarah J. Maas; From Blood and Ash by Jennifer Armentrout; Rhapsodic, Pestilence, The Queen of All that Dies by Laura Thalassa.Release in 2023.
author: Misha Quinn
